name: Cheerleaders Dance Competition
description:
To be a professional cheerleader dancer is not an easy job. Cheerleaders usually need a lot of practice and fitness on daily basis. So if you are a girl who is real interested for cheerleaders dance competition then you need a trainer and lot of practice as well.Your dancing skills will help you to become more professional cheerleader and win the contest to get selected for the squad.

When you are performing with the cheerleader squad, you need to help your squad to win the first prize. You need to compete with other cheerleaders to become the star cheerleader of the year award. This is a entertainment game for girls to be a star cheerleaders and let’s play the different dance moves and dancing animation on your mobile phone.There are different levels to enjoy in this dancing game.

KITCHEN TIME …!!!

Being fit and get the pure and healthy food is very important for any cheerleader dancer. So you need to eat fruits, cake, pasta and many more foods with vitamins. Take care of your diet plan.

CHEERLEARDER SALON …!!!

Let’s move to the cheerleader salon to have an unforgettable experience with your dreamed spa salon. Here you can use shower, scrub, towel, pimple remover, shampoo, soap and cleaner.

MAKEUP SALON …!!!!

There is a proper makeup salon for our professional cheerleaders to look charming and stunning in the crowd.You can use lipstick, eye coloring, chic shades, ear rings and eye shades.

DRESS UP ROOM ..!!!

DressUP your favorite cheerleader with lot of outfits and clothes like shoes, necklace, cheerleaders socks and many more.

DANCING STEPS …!!!

There is variety of steps that can be perform by professional cheerleaders. User can select between many steps in this level. Cheerleaders will make the crowd happy with their dancing and moves steps.

This game is totally free to download and play for girls and kids. Where the items inside the game are also free to use. You can play as many time as you want with out spending any money. This cheerleaders dancing game is free for you to support your favorite team in football or cricket.

Do not forget to play all of our other makeup, makeover, cooking, tailoring, school teacher, love crush, fitness gym, supermarket shopping, hip hop dancing, Ice Cream cooking, ballerina dance, babies and dress up games for girls and kids.

TinyBit games, tiny masterpieces !
